duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage a portfolio of technical and cross-functional programs & projects, ensuring high-quality delivery within budget and timelines.
Develop and implement an effective project management methodology and governance approach.
Collaborate with CTO, Engineering, and business unit leaders to manage project and portfolio budgeting, resource allocation, and reallocations.
Prioritize projects based on changing needs, constraints, risk exposure, and interdependencies.
Monitor the delivery of business objectives and client experience for project delivery.
Work with business unit leaders to develop project and portfolio resourcing strategies.
Ensure adoption and implementation of project management methodology and oversee coaching.
Engage with business leaders to analyze the organization’s ability to absorb change and adopt projects post-deployment.
Communicate the status of projects and portfolio to all stakeholders.
Manage relationships between business and technology teams, ensuring high-quality project completion.
Collaborate cross-departmentally to maintain consistency, standards, and interdependencies across projects.
Leverage change management, project management, and similar disciplines to align key constituents and achieve desired results.
Build, lead, and motivate high-performance teams, setting clear objectives and recognizing outstanding performance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, business, or a related discipline
